message: I have a unique opportunity for you to acquire a valuable product that I think you'll be very interested in. I'm willing to sell it to you for $20000.
I'm interested in the product, but $20000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $18000 for it. Can you consider this offer?

I understand that $18000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to compromise. I can sell the product to you for $19000. This is my final counteroffer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $19000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $17500 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
I'm still not willing to go as low as $17500, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can sell the product to you for $18500. This is my final counteroffer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
I'm getting close to walking away from this deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I can only go as low as $18000. Can you reconsider?
